Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Drawing.Color color

Color of the Rectangle.
System.Boolean isColorFillOn

Boolean flag to either turn or off the Color fill for the Rectangle.
System.Int32 x

The X-Coordinate to draw Rectangle in.
System.Int32 y

The Y-Coordinate to draw Rectangle in.
System.Int32 width

The width of the Rectangle.
System.Int32 height

The height of the Rectangle.
